Welcome To My Blog

02 Oct 2015

Welcome to my site! My name is Jason Cui and I am a sophomore at Harvard studying computer science. I am passionate about technology, scientific discovery, and entrepreneurship. This site is a collection of my projects, thoughts, and random materials I find interesting.

Feel free to reach out on my contact page or through my social media handles below.

Social

  • LinkedIn
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Facebook

If you’re curious, this site was built with Jekyll and Poole and is hosted (for free!) with GitHub Pages.

Thanks for reading!
